name: Beautiful Palace Social Ad Daycare Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Beautiful Palace Social Ad Daycare Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Adult Day Care provider based in Flushing, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.5M in Medicaid payments across 227K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
